Let's talk about the seasons of the year and especially about the most important season, the season of performance evaluations in the workplace. You know how everyone is under pressure? The managers are busy giving a million generic feedbacks to the employees, the employees are looking for team members who will fill out a perfect peer evaluation for them, God forbid, because we agreed that I will give it to you and you will give it to me and in a way Workplace rules as a recipe for this year's act of feedback, bonuses and promotions. Everything is on the scales in very specific processes. I always have a rule. I think that less have succeeded and require a change of course for the coming year. No matter how good you think you are, in the end even if we arranged well on paper what we wanted to say and rehearsed how important the achievements we reached are, we still need to learn how to express them verbally and give a speech that will not embarrass an expert lecture In front of a panel of judges when we press the right buttons. All of this is compressed into the feedback conversation where you are required to tell about the past year, give explanations and find the points that are important for your manager to see change and improvement in, in order to succeed and achieve results that will be reflected in financial compensation or promotion. And there is a relatively simple way to do this. Invest in learning who you are facing.

Almog Z'an is simply an insanely exciting person, this is how he writes for the first time after he was rescued from Hamas captivity. If someone had told me that this was the script of my life, probably not, I'm sure I would have hospitalized that person and continued with my life, but unfortunately this is the reality that has happened to our country in the last year, to get out of Gaza It was the happiest day of my life and in the same breath also the saddest and most painful day I've ever had, I lost Tomer Zell who was the brother I never had, the best person I know, every second I was in captivity I prayed that he was at home waiting for me safe and sound. Today I know how to say That Tomer watched over me all the time from above and he made sure that I would be here now. I lost my dear father, my mentor and the man who taught me that love has endless faces, types and different ways. I'm sure that my father didn't just leave when I came back, you gave me top protection during The rescue is so that I can return safely and I know you are in a good and restful place, I love you more than myself. I lost brothers and sisters who danced by my side in the same square and I also lost brothers who went to fight in Gaza to bring me back and did not return when at the tip of the spear is Arnon Zamora ZL who led my rescue and in his death commanded us life, I will remember you forever my brother, I will take care as much as I can for your family, for the upliftment of your soul and to lift up your name. Lately I realized that we are not meant to understand everything and the ways of God are hidden, but Rabak why?

In honor of almost consecutive reserve days, I am attaching the guide here so that you can identify a work environment that supports the reservist or despises him. A supportive environment offers you an acclimatization leave after the reserve.  An abusive environment They send you a meeting summons for the next week before you've even had time to take off your uniform.  Supportive environment Their logo is updated on social media to the colors of the flag when you are in the reserves.  Disgusting environment they forget to pay you for the reserve days.  Supportive environment They send you a package of treats to the base.  A hostile environment they send you reminders about deadlines to the base.  Supportive environment They organize a back-to-work party for you with a cake.  A hostile environment They arrange a conference call for you at a guard post.  Supportive environment Update your email signature to Currently in reserve, looking after all of us I'll be back soon.  An abusive environment They check that you are available for an urgent email about the organizational change where you no longer have a clue if you have any work left. What do they say abusive or annoying?
